nodes.name: Add Data in Apollo Scraped Data Sheet
Get data with "For Company Qualifying" status
Add Contact as Prospect in Campaign

parameters.content:
## Company Qualifier
- Get all data from Maps Scrapped data
- Loop all items to find the qualified companies via Apollo depending on user's input 
- Saves the Qualified or Disqualified companies

## Contact Identifier
- Gets all Qualified Companies data to set as a condition for searching people on Apollo
- Saves Contact info and updates the qualified company status to "Contact Found"

## Leads Outreacher
- Stops the existing Campaign so that the contacts can be saved as prospect.
- Gets the saved contacts and send it to woodpecker as the prospect of the campaign.
- After the loop for saving a prospect, it will run again the campaign.

main.node: Add Data in Apollo Scraped Data Sheet
Add Contact as Prospect in Campaign
Get data with "For Company Qualifying" status
